subject: Re: Order #SSN5651 confirmed
description_text:

I have a question for you. I ordered pedals and I didn't see the Mounting 
BracketU-Shaped Mounting Bracket for Brake, U-Shaped Mounting Bracket for 
Throttle in the final order.




Are they included in the order?




Thx a lot. 




JV

conversations.body_text:
Hello,




And if it was not part of the order, please add it and send me an invoice 
for additional payment. I know I put it in the order, but it did not show up
in the cart.

Thank you and have a nice evening.





JV

---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: vujtechjiri@seznam.cz
Komu: SIMSONN
Hi Vujtechjiri,  I’ve checked your order and confirmed that it includes a U-shaped horizontal mounting bracket.

Hi, 



Thank you very much for the confirmation. I can't wait. When can I expect 
the shipment?





Thx




JV


---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com

Hi Vujtechjiri,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.  Here is your Haptics logistics tracking link. This product has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We sincerely apologize for the delay.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2600700706234445

Hi, 




Okay, thanks for the reply. I was just thinking it was strange that the 
pedals still don't have a label. Do you think there's a chance they'll
arrive by the end of the month? 




Thank you and have a nice day. 





JV







---------- Původní e‑mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com

Hi Vujtechjiri,    We will try our best to ship your order after the goods arrive at our German warehouse on the 21st. However, if further delays occur, we will ship your order from China via UPS Express. Should any taxes or fees arise, I will reimburse you. We will do our utmost to ensure delivery by the end of the month.

Hi, 



Ok, thank you very much for the quick response. I'll look forward to it.

---------- Původní e‑mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
